contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 28, 1912 D Crystal Palace (Boys Section)
Crystal Palace (Boys Section) 200 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) crystal-palace-boys-section
Cheerful Chums
Crystal Palace, Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK 1st prize £5 and Woods Challenge Cup. 2nd prize £2. 3rd prize £1.
Bands also played "Norma" by Bellini
7 bands competed.
May 7, 2012, 11:48 a.m. Feb. 18, 2015, 11:12 p.m.
1 St. Pancras School A. R. Byles
2 Shaftesbury School W. Prosser
3 Poplar Training Schools S. T. Webber
Unknown Result Sidcup Schools R. Bonner
Unknown Result St Nicholas School P. McDonald
Unknown Result St Vincent School Frank MacDonald
Unknown Result Shirley Schools J. Machell
